name: BBall Shots Challenge
description:
BasketBall Shots Challenge is the best basketball game to play. 

Practice your Basketball shooting skills. Tap the screen to throw the ball and score as many points as you can to unlock the next time countdown or level.

BBall shots challenge is a simple and amazing fun Basketball 2 point shooting game to play. Play for as long as you can and get enough points to unlock the the next time countdown.

The game has time limit and the moving basket is a challenge for even experienced players.

Basketball Shots Challenge features:
- Six levels to play with time limit.
- Tap the screen to throw the ball
- Beautiful graphics
- Amazing sound music
If you like BBall shot challenge please give us some rate and review! Thank you!
